name: Friedenspanzer
description:
Make games, not war.

This small game was based on a tutorial project from a Unity C# tutorial by GameDevTV. It was the only game project I actually didn't want to flesh out after finishing the tutorial, because I don't want to create shooters.

But then war happened and somehow I wanted to make something. Don't expect varying gameplay here. Like war, it's always the same.

Maybe you know the "Friedenspanzer" flowerpower song by "Die Ärzte"?
It's about the utopia of peace.
